titleStmt.title: A catalogue containing variety of ancient and modern English books in divinity, history, philology, philosophy, [double brace] law, physick, mathematicks &c. together with Bibles, Testaments, Common prayers ... will be exposed to sale ... the 30th day of November 1685 / by Edward Millington ...
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

titleStmt.title: A catalogue containing variety of ancient and modern English books in divinity, history, philology, philosophy, [double brace] law, physick, mathematicks &c. together with Bibles, Testaments, Common prayers ... will be exposed to sale ... the 30th day of November 1685 / by Edward Millington ...
titleStmt.author: Millington, Edward, d. 1703.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 1279:9 and reel 1710:16.
Imperfect: p. 51-52 of copy at reel 1279:9 cropped; copy at reel 1710:16 defaced; both have loss of text.
"Catalogues are given by Mr. Nott in Pall-Mall, Mr. Timothy Goodwin at the Maidenhead in Fleet-street, Mr. Joseph Wats at the Half-Moon, and Mr. Samuel Smith at the Princes Arms in St.
Reproduction of originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
